resources.string: Passphrase must contain at least 8 characters, including an uppercase letter, a lowercase letter, a number, and a special character.
The entered passphrases do not match
Passphrase Mismatch
The entered passphrases do not match. Please ensure you enter the same passphrase in both fields.

Mnemonic seed (BIP-39)
Eg: abandon banana captain dance eagle fabric galaxy habit ice jacket kangaroo languageâ€¦

Encrypt
Generate passphrase
\u2022 Warning: Enhanced security from a complex passphrase comes with an important reminder: safekeeping is essential. As memorization becomes more challenging, extra caution is imperative.

\u2022 Suggested use: It\'s highly suggested to use Seedcake on a device that\'s offline and formatted, if possible. Think of it as a temporary help or a quick fix when physical storage isn\'t available. Cryptosteel or similar offer long-term safety.
Disclaimer

\u2022 Seed responsibility: You understand that you are entirely responsible for the secure storage of your seeds. Seeds are extremely sensitive data and should be handled with utmost care. The loss, exposure, or misuse of your seeds can result in the irreversible loss of digital assets.
\u2022 Responsible use: You agree to use the Seedcake app responsibly. This includes, but is not limited to, following all guidelines and recommendations provided by the app regarding seed security.
\u2022 Indemnification: You agree to indemnify the developers and operators of the Seedcake app from any liability for losses you may suffer as a result of using the app.
By checking the box, you confirm that you have read and understood this Consent Agreement and agree to abide by its terms.
Consent Agreement Unconfirmed
To proceed, you must confirm that you have read and understood the Consent Agreement. Please check the box to indicate your agreement.

\u2022 Warning: Seedcake does not store your passphrase locally or remotely. If you lose your passphrase, there\'s nothing we can do to assist you. \n\n\u2022 Caution: For your safety, establish a strong passphrase exclusive to this application. Never reuse a passphrase that\'s already in use.
Enter Your BIP-39 Mnemonic Seed
seed phrase length: 12 or 24 words
Seed Phrase Protection: Choose an encryption method
%s (recommended)
AES GCM

Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) with Galois/Counter Mode (GCM) without padding. \n\nOffers strong encryption with extra verification to keep your seed phrase safe and sound. Ideal for those seeking peace of mind with top-level security.
ChaCha20
ChaCha20 with Poly1305 for Message Authentication Code (MAC). \n\nProvides robust protection with efficiency, making it a solid choice for safeguarding your seed phrase with cutting-edge security.
AES CTR
Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) with Counter Mode (CTR) without padding. \n\nA reliable choice for secure encryption, keeping your seed phrase safe without any additional complexity.
AES CBC

Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) with Cipher Block Chaining (CBC) and PKCS5Padding. \n\nA reliable, time-proven encryption method that offers a high level of security. Perfect for those who prefer the classic approach.
This screen allows you to select an encryption algorithm to secure your seed phrase. Each algorithm has unique features that offer different levels of protection.
Encryption mode: %s
Considerations
\u2022 Seedcake is a temporary storage solution.
\u2022 For long term, consider a Cryptosteel or similar.
\u2022 IMPORTANT: Seedcake doesn\'t store your passphrase. Without the correct passphrase, decryption is impossible!
Save in database
Unable to complete encryption storage operation. A system issue prevented saving the data.
Encrypted data stored successfully.
